reviews.review_msg: Sinan is awesome!!! He is one of my favourite profs at SFU. He's funny, listens and actually cares about his students' opinions. His exams are fairly easy and are pretty much based on his notes! I would love to take another class with him :).

Sinan is one of the best prof in SFU. The man teaches so well and his exams is based on what he teaches unlike other profs. If you read his notes and go to class everyday, you will do fine. One thing I don't like about him is that he is picky on grammar mistakes for papers, but overall he is a great teacher.
